core

Class Install

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.ActionBase
      • core.Install

  • public class Install
extends ActionBase
    Manage the installation of a Corpoplugin. Will also check the existing plugins to avoid any collisions between plugins.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Fati CHEN

    • Method Detail

      • installPlugin

        public static void installPlugin(java.lang.String path_to_install,
                                 boolean debug)
        Will install the specified plugin. Will if the plugin is extended from the Corpoplugin interface, check if it's aready installed, then will copy it under : installation_folder/plugin_name/
        Parameters:
        path_to_install - String Is the path to the plugin to install
        debug - boolean Will display the progression of the action if true.
        See Also:
        Delete

      • isInstalled

        protected static boolean isInstalled(java.lang.String name)
        Will check if the plugin is present in the configuration file.
        Parameters:
        name - String the name of the plugin, will be converted to UPPERCASE
        Returns:
        true if the plugin is installed.

      • hasDependencies

        protected static void hasDependencies(Pluginspecs plugin_specs)
                               throws PluginDependenciesNotPresentException
        Verify if the dependencies of a plugin are present Will throw an PluginDependenciesNotPresentException if the dependencies of the given plugin are not present in the config file
        Parameters:
        plugin_specs - Pluginspecs Contains the plugin specifications
        Throws:
        PluginDependenciesNotPresentException - If the wanted dependencies are not present in Corporatique

      • addPlugintoConfig

        private static void addPlugintoConfig(Pluginspecs plugin_specs)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Will add the given pluginspecs to the configuration file
        Parameters:
        plugin_specs - Pluginspecs contains the plugin specifications
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are errors accessing the configuration file

      • copyPlugintoDirectory

        private static void copyPlugintoDirectory(java.lang.String plugin_name,
                                          java.io.File plugin_path)
                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          IsNotJarException
        Will copy the given plugin File under plugins/plugin_name
        Parameters:
        plugin_name - String The name of the plugin
        plugin_path - File The path to the plugin
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are errors copying the plugin into the folder
        IsNotJarException - if the given path is not a jar
